snippet: Lawmakers on Wednesday rejected a plan by the Postal Service, faced with billions in losses, to stop delivering mail on Saturdays.
lead_paragraph: Lawmakers on Wednesday rejected a plan by the Postal Service, faced with billions in losses, to stop delivering mail on Saturdays.

headline.seo: Six-Day Mail Delivery Must Continue, House Says
headline.main: House Tells Postal Service to Keep Six-Day Delivery
